ComicInfo.Title: Chapter One: Eve of Destruction
ComicInfo.Summary:
In 1969 a timid teen sets out on a road trip. His goal? Find out the origins of his bizarre super human abilities. Always the follower, his trip is derailed when he befriends a group of extremist war protesters. Variant cover by series artist JD Faith (Virgil) limited to 1,500 copies!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | JD Faith | 1 | Var | Limited Edition Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | JD Faith | 2 | Note: The digital edition (11/4/2015) for this issue was released before the print edition.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-11-27 15:59:50. [CVDB504993]
